articles.author: CBSNews
articles.title: Manhunt continues for well-armed survivalist suspected of killing 2 cops - yahoo.com
articles.description: Australian police are hunting for a man accused of killing 2 of their own. He's well-armed, and local media say he's a radical anti-government conspiracy...
articles.content: Porepunkah, Australia Australian police said Thursday they will not rest until they catch a 56-year-old gunman who fled into the bush two days earlier after allegedly killing two officers. Detectives… [+4701 chars]
